title: About me
text:
I’m a biostatistician with a Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics and a Master’s degree in Data Science. I have more than 6 years of experience in clinical research analysis, programming in R and creating shiny web applications & developing new R packages.
Contact
 pau.satorra@gmail.com
 @pasahe
 0000-0002-8144-4089

title: About me
text:
Work experience
6 years of experience in two different biostatics unit associated to two large hospitals in Spain providing statistical consulting during all phases of clinical research studies. My main duties include performing and designing statistical analyses, writing statistical reports, creating web applications, building and managing databases and writing publications.
Statistician in Biostatistics Support and Research Unit Germans Trias i Pujol Research Institute and Hospital (IGTP), Badalona, Spain 2023-Current

Statistician in Biostatistics Unit Bellvitge Biomedical Research Institute (IDIBELL), L’Hospitalet de Llobregat, Spain 2019-2023
